mapper.select: select post_project.*,post.seq_blog,post.title,post.regtime,post.disclosure,post.like_count from post inner join post_project on post.seq=post_project.seq where post_project.seq in ( select seq_post_project from post_portfolio_project where seq_post_portfolio = #{ seq_post_portfolio } );
mapper.insert: insert into post_portfolio_project( seq_post_portfolio, set_post_project) values ( #{seq_post_portfolio}, #{set_post_project} )
